Hoboken.David Zwirner Gallery:
The David Zwirner Gallery is an American contemporary art gallery owned by David Zwirner. It has three gallery spaces in New York City and one in London, and has plans to open in Hong Kong.


== History ==
Zwirner opened his first gallery in 1993 on the ground floor of 43 Greene Street in SoHo in New York City, with a one-man show of the Austrian sculptor Franz West.
